## ARTHStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [ARTHStore](./arth-base.arthstore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ARTHStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./arth-base.arthstore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./arth-base.arthstorelistenerparams.newstate.md) | [ARTHStoreState](./arth-base.arthstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
|  [oldState](./arth-base.arthstorelistenerparams.oldstate.md) | [ARTHStoreState](./arth-base.arthstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire new state. |
|  [stateChange](./arth-base.arthstorelistenerparams.statechange.md) | Partial&lt;[ARTHStoreState](./arth-base.arthstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | Only the state variables that have changed. |
